name: 01 Direction: Robot Boy-band Experience
description:
01 Direction is a game created for Weekly GameJam - Week 92. 

The theme of the game jam was "One Direction", I decided to take it quite literally and make a One Direction/Boyband rhythm game. 

This is my first solo/weekly gamejam! Any feedback would be appreciated.

Note: Audio sync issues can occur, sadly I didn't have time to debug it/gamemaker isnt very suitable for Rhythm Games.

Controls:

  • WASD/ARROW KEYS - Rhythm Game Buttons
  • Enter - Action key for Menus

Credits:

This was a solo project, created by myself,

Keypress art assets used by:

With thanks to George LB, for the music collaboration.
